question_sentence: Free agent quarterback Colin Kaepernick landed a workout with which NFL team this week?
Last week’s episode of “SNL” was the season finale. Which of these cast members is expected to return next season?
It was announced this week that MacKenzie Scott donated $122 million to which organization?
choices: Big Brothers Big Sisters of America

question_sentence: Who confronted Gov. Greg Abbott at a news conference after the deadly mass shooting in Uvalde, Texas?
Which of these shows had its series finale this week?
A Toy Fox Terrier named Pebbles has been crowned the new queen, setting a Guinness World Record for being the oldest living dog. How old is she?
Novelist Nancy Crampton Brophy, author of “How to Murder Your Husband,” was on trial for allegedly murdering her husband. What was the outcome?
A new “American Idol” was crowned when the show wrapped its 20th season this week. Who won?
Gangster-movie icon Ray Liotta died in his sleep in the Dominican Republic while filming an upcoming movie. Which of these movies was he NOT in?
Meteorologists released the forecast for the 2022 Atlantic hurricane season. How many hurricanes do they say could form this year?
The Quadrilateral Security Dialogue, known as ‘the Quad’, is made up of which nations?
choices: Australia, New Zealand, UK and US
evidence: The alliance began as a loose partnership after the Indian Ocean tsunami in 2004, when the US, Japan, Australia and India joined forces to provide humanitarian and disaster relief

question_sentence: Which MP topped a chart of parliamentarians who have earned the most from employment opportunities outside of their parliamentary role between 2019 and 2022?
evidence: Cox, who is a qualified barrister, topped the list after earning  £1,835,399.89 from external employment

question_sentence: Which British actor held a fireworks display for his girlfriend’s birthday that was so loud it terrified local residents?
evidence: The Times said the pyrotechnics in a ‘quiet Cotswolds valley’ caused residents to fear that ‘a heavy bomber group’ might be ‘dropping their payload’

question_sentence: Which British supermodel, once the girlfriend of film star Johnny Depp, testified at his libel trial this week?
evidence: Moss said that Depp had never abused her, contradicting a claim made by the actor’s ex-wife Amber Heard

question_sentence: Chancellor Rishi Sunak announced an emergency support package for households struggling with the cost of living worth how much?
evidence: The total cost of the new emergency support package is £15bn, on top of the £22bn the government had already announced in the spring, said the chancellor

question_sentence: A councillor in North Wales resigned from his post after being dogged by rumours that he was which anonymous figure?
evidence: William Gannon was voted on to a Pembrokeshire town council having worked as a community artist, but he feared being held responsible after vandals graffitied the local area

question_sentence: Manchester City pipped Liverpool to the Premier League title, but which player scored the winning goal in their 3-2 victory over Aston Villa?
evidence: The win secured the team’s fourth title win in five years

question_sentence: Which members of the Royal Family are set to appear on EastEnders in a special episode celebrating the Queen’s Platinum Jubilee?
choices: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge
The Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall
The Earl and Countess of Wessex
The Duke and Duchess of Sussex
evidence: Charles and Camilla will join the residents of Albert Square for a street party held in honour of the Queen’s 70 years on the throne. They filmed the scenes in March when they visited the soap’s Elstree set and met members of the cast

question_sentence: New research by scientists at the University of California suggested that memory loss in older age could be restored using maraviroc – a drug already used to treat which virus?
evidence: Researchers discovered a gene that erases some memories and found that switching it off boosts recall

question_sentence: Liverpool will face Real Madrid on Saturday in the Champions League final in Paris. How many times have the clubs previously played each other in the final?
evidence: The two teams previously faced each other in 1981 and 2018

question_sentence: Which continent did President Biden visit this week?
evidence: President Biden made his first trip to Asia since taking office. While there, he participated in a high-level summit with Indo-Pacific leaders.

question_sentence: How many months has it been since Russia launched its invasion of Ukraine?
evidence: Tuesday marked three months since Russian President Vladimir Putin sent soldiers to invade Ukraine. Since then, a staggering 8 million people within the country have been displaced, according to the UN Refugee Agency.

question_sentence: To help combat the nationwide shortage of baby formula, the US flew in tons of formula from which country this week?
evidence: A shipment of 35 tons of baby formula was flown to Indianapolis from Germany this week on US military aircraft. The country is among several others participating in the Biden administration’s Operation Fly Formula mission.

question_sentence: What solution is the White House exploring to ease a spike in diesel fuel prices?
choices: Importing diesel fuel from Mexico and Canada
Tapping into an emergency diesel reserve
evidence: The White House is considering an emergency declaration that would allow the President to tap into a rarely used emergency diesel reserve to address a major supply crunch. Diesel is a vital fuel for the US economy, powering not only farm and construction equipment but the trucks, trains and boats that move goods across the country.

question_sentence: Which show recently said goodbye to beloved cast members Pete Davidson and Kate McKinnon?
evidence: “Saturday Night Live” closed out its 47th season with a funny, yet emotional episode — bidding farewell to Davidson and McKinnon. Watch their goodbye moments here.

question_sentence: Who won the 2022 PGA Championship?
evidence: It was a tee-rific victory for 29-year-old professional golfer Justin Thomas and the second major of his career.

question_sentence: More than 100 confirmed or suspected cases of a rare virus have been reported in individuals across 12 countries, including the US. What is the name of the virus?
evidence: Cases of Monkeypox are being reported worldwide, including in the US — where one health official said he expects more new cases in the days ahead.

question_sentence: Which state could face mandatory water restrictions this summer unless residents and businesses scale back on their water use?
evidence: Gov. Gavin Newsom this week called on Californians to urgently cut their water usage or soon face mandatory statewide water restrictions — possibly even punishable by fines.

question_sentence: What type of food products are companies recalling due to salmonella contamination concerns?
evidence: Several food companies have pulled items containing peanut butter due to potential salmonella contamination.

question_sentence: A huge new underground railway line opened in which major city this week?
evidence: The Elizabeth line — named in honor of Queen Elizabeth II — opened deep beneath the streets of London this week.
